title: Language Learning Design Utilizing Diagram Visualization Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of linguistic structures and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education visualizing complex language processes using VR/simulation tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning materials using various diagram types (flowcharts, concept maps, etc.)
Learners can select optimal visualization strategies for specific language structures and validate their effectiveness
Learners can develop diagram-based learning modules applicable to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
